about_the_game:
Carpe Noctem is a Gothic lesbian romance inspired by Castlevania and Sheridan Le Fanu's Carmilla.

This visual novel takes place in an alternate Victorian England plagued by creatures of the night. Adelaide Hadid, an orphan trained by The Church to slay monsters, is dispatched to a rural town to eliminate a powerful vampiress.

After a fateful duel with the seductive Cordelia, Adelaide finds herself growing closer to the vampiress and her charming maid, Lily. With her life suddenly beginning to change, the monster hunter must grapple with her conflicted feelings about her target and The Church...

------------------------------------------

Made with Visual Novel Maker

Illustration Art by Yutzu13, indracgunawans, Rizky, and MISOTO_MNW. Character Art by Warman, finnaubot, ardianzah, and LalaGalery.

Background Art by syaviray, ExArthur, Elduator, and selavi. Additional Art by ntgn and Mia Rosado

Music by Solas Composer

content_descriptors.notes: Contains depictions of blood and violence.

detailed_description:
Carpe Noctem is a Gothic lesbian romance inspired by Castlevania and Sheridan Le Fanu's Carmilla.

This visual novel takes place in an alternate Victorian England plagued by creatures of the night. Adelaide Hadid, an orphan trained by The Church to slay monsters, is dispatched to a rural town to eliminate a powerful vampiress.

After a fateful duel with the seductive Cordelia, Adelaide finds herself growing closer to the vampiress and her charming maid, Lily. With her life suddenly beginning to change, the monster hunter must grapple with her conflicted feelings about her target and The Church...

Background Art by syaviray, ExArthur, Elduator, and selavi. Additional Art by ntgn and Mia Rosado

name: Carpe Noctem - Yuri Visual Novel

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel: Core i5 minimum
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • DirectX: Version 7.0
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A yuri visual novel about a vampiress and a monster hunter falling in love in Victorian England.
